Title: The Uptick
Writer: Alec Berg, Mike Judge (created by), John Altschuler (created by), Dave Krinsky (created by)
Actors: Thomas Middleditch, T.J. Miller, Josh Brener, Martin Starr
Plot: Pied Piper's future is hazy, but Erlich's industry profile begins to rise, creating a moral dilemma for Richard as Dinesh's new app starts to catch on. Meanwhile, Laurie makes plans for her...
